abstract.text: A base type that preview macros use to create previews.

inlineContent.text: Frameworks like SwiftUI and WidgetKit define initializers for this type,
along with framework-specific preview macros that rely on this type.
You donâ€™t use this type directly. Instead, use one of the preview macros,

abstract.text: Expose custom views and modifiers in the Xcode library.
A base type that preview macros use to create previews.

A singleton actor whose executor is equivalent to the main dispatch queue.
A thread-safe type whose values can be shared across arbitrary concurrent contexts without introducing a risk of data races.
